kpi.name: M1023C17

kpi_info.title: TRANSFERRED DATA FOR PS STREAMING IN UL
kpi_info.use: The amount of MAC-d PDU PS streaming data in SRNC in the uplink direction measured during the measurement interval. This counter includes pure Rel99 DCH connections, HS-DSCH uplink return channel and E-DCH. UPDATED: The counter is updated at 20-second intervals. If the UE is in softer handover, then the counter is updated for only one cell once per each BTS.

kpi.kpi_alias: TRANSFERRED DATA FOR PS STREAMING IN UL
